resources.string:
Hi, I am better known as GOAT from my FPL mini-league exploits 
 I was born in Nyeri - Kenya 
 Android programming is in my blood and I enjoy it big time 
 The Big Bang intrests me a lot 
 I love cats 
 I like brown skin gals 
 My ultimate destination is Nice la Belle i.e. Nice because 
 Nice has the vibrancy of Italy and the charm of France 
 I'm a nice guy 
 You can find me on this website 
 www.androidshowtime.com 
 My brother is called Charles 
 I work as a Care Manager
